contact.title: Contact
contact.p1: Hello! My name is Lucas Sodr√© Salgado, I'm Brazilian and I'm 27 years old. I'm a developer passionate about technology, always looking for new opportunities and challenges. If you want to discuss a project, ask questions about my work or simply exchange ideas, don't hesitate to contact me.
contact.time: More than 3 years of professional experience
contact.experience: Solid experience with Spring Boot, Angular, SQL and Oracle DB
contact.knowledge: Knowledge of Golang, Next.js, React, Tailwind CSS, Prisma, Postgres and AWS
